title: i got permanently banned just then
body: is there a way i can retrieve my perma banned account or nah?

replies.body: Nah perma bans only last a couple of days.........

Only if the ban was made in error. If you feel it was you can [submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to appeal the ban. If the ban was not made in error it will not be removed.
They  call it permanent ban for a reason, unless you were perm banned under false accusations  you should send a ticket to riot.
